name: Baby clothes
description: Family has 3 young children aged 4, 2 and 0 years old. Mum just gave birth to her son last week and needs baby items for her child. Mum is currently the full time caregiver for children and father is working as a grab rider with unstable income.

passiton.name: Infant and baby clothes
passiton.description: Giving away pre loved  infant and toddler clothes.

name: Milk Powder
description:
Low-income mother of 3 requires support in attaining milk powder for her 3 young kids (6y/o, 3y/o and 1y/o). Her husband is a sole breadwinner and has to support his 6 other children. This additional support would mean a lot for the couple in this current time. 

- 2 tins of Dulac infant milk (1)
- 2 tins of Dugro Growing up Milk (3)
- 2 tins of Dugro Growing up Milk (5)

For more information, please contact Hanna at 8878 8846 or hanna@newlifestories.org.sg. Thank you.

passiton.name: S-26 Gold Progress Stage 3 Milk Powder Brand New
passiton.description:
Brand New Stage 3 S26 Milk Powder
Expiry 17 July 2026

name: Playpen
description: Client and her husband are low-income earners with two children currently attending preschool. The family is seeking donors who are willing to contribute a playpen for their young children.

passiton.name: Joie playpen
passiton.description:
eping baby comfortably cosy is a breeze, with a rounded base that elevates them from chilly drafts

 

CONVENIENCE

Travel and storage is simple with a cot that tucks away into a tidy, compact package so you can stow and go in a flash

Simple and stylish design with exposed tubing ensures that baby's space complements your place

Customise baby's sleeping arrangements in a snap with a bassinet that quickly clips on and off

An ultra secure frame safeguards naptime and playtime, allowing baby to rest secure and play it safe

Removable mattress creates a cosy home base for both naptime and playtime.

2 integrated wheels mean this cot is ready to roll from room to room when baby's done resting

Navigate the ins and outs of naptime and playtime with zippered sides that allow for baby's easy entry or exit

 

EXTRAS

Included changing unit and snoozing seat pop on or off with a quick click - for fast transitions, easy travel and peace of mind

Storage and transport are no burden thanks to the included custom carry bag

Customise baby's sleeping arrangement with the full-sized bassinet that comes included with the travel cot


Product Weight: 12.9 kg 

Open Size: l 106 x w 70.5 x h 80 cm 

Folded Size: l 79  x w 25 x h 21 cm 

Usage: birth to 15 kg

name: Bicycle
description: The client resides with 6 of her children. The household faces financial difficulties, client prioritizing providing children's basic needs - while having accumulated outstanding debts. This is especially so as 4 children are still studying, while her older 2 children are not working presently and she is the sole breadwinner. Considering their financially tight situation, the family wishes to request for a bicycle through PIO. We would be grateful if the donor can provide/pay for delivery of the bicycle to the client.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Low Zi Yuan

passiton.name: Bicycle helmet
passiton.description: Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.

name: Bicycle
description:
The client is a single mom of 6 children, ages from 2 year old to 10 years old.

The client has been unemployed for more than 6 months but managed to secure a job as a factory operator recently. She also wants to work as an ad hoc delivery rider during her free time to earn additional income to support her family but needs a bicycle as a tool of transportation.

In addition, due to the lack of financial support from her ex-husband, formula milk and diapers are a real strain on her budget.  Any donation of toddler formula or diapers would be a huge help and would allow the client to focus on her job.

passiton.name: Bicycle helmet
passiton.description: Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.

name: Coffee table
description: Client is 71y/o, he has a son with mental health condition and another son with learning disability therefore they are unable to provide caregiving to client. Client is in the midst of waiting for a rental flat from HDB, and is currently staying with his niece who has been housing him and his son for 2 months since they were chased out by another relative. There has been a bed bug situation recently that destroyed multiple of the family's home furnitures, and the family currently has no coffee table to prepare for upcoming Hari Raya.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

passiton.name: Coffee table with Chinese carvings (antique)
passiton.description: Genuine antique Chinese coffee table with carvings and mother of pearl inlay work. It’s an original antique so has signs of wear & tear. Comes with glass top
passiton.location: Amber Road, East Coast, Joo Chiat, Katong, Marine Parade, Meyer, Tanjong Rhu

name: 2-seater Sofa
description:
Single mother of 5 young kids (aged 9,8,7,5,1) in need of support in getting a 2-seater sofa in her rental flat. Best if the sofa could be used as a foldable bed. Will need support in the delivery services as well.   

For more information, please contact Hanna at 8878 8846 or hanna@newlifestories.org.sg. Thank you.
